emotional_intensity_shift.description: Rapid or notable increase/decrease in emotional energy.

withdrawal_or_distance.description: Reduction in presence, engagement, responsiveness, or relational closeness.

overexplanation_or_control.description: Attempts to stabilize uncertainty through detailed justification or structured framing.

validation_seeking_behavior.description: Direct or indirect attempts to gain affirmation, reassurance, or approval.

risk_taking_or_novelty_pursuit.description: Behavior indicating desire for stimulation, change, or exploration.

conflict_escalation_marker.description: Verbal or behavioral patterns that indicate rising conflict intensity.

identity_defense_trigger.description: Statements or behaviors indicating threatened self-concept.
